title: Quantum Approximate Optimization Algorithm
description: Reviewd and implemented the Quantum Approximate Optimization Algorithm (QAOA) for combinatorial optimization problems using quantum simulators.

title: DPS Quantum Key Distribution
description: Developed a simulation framework to model and analyze the practical, device-level implementation of Differential Phase Shift Quantum Key Distribution (DPS-QKD).

title: Quantum Random Number Generator
description: Developed, benchmarked, and validated a high-speed Quantum Random Number Generator (QRNG) based on photon arrival time, achieving state-of-the-art throughput and randomness for commercial cryptographic applications.

title: Optimal Quantum Control
description: Explored the fundamental limits on how fast unitary transformations can be performed to enable precise optical quantum control.
